key.name: position
key.description: Whether to put the applet in a separate menu or replace the master volume mixer already present

key.name: remove-original
key.description: Whether to remove the master volume slider from status menu

key.name: show-percentage-label
key.description: Whether to show percentage of current output right of the icon

key.name: show-detailed-sliders
key.description: Whether to show detailed sliders with different icons and the stream's description

key.name: show-system-sounds
key.description: Whether to show a sliders for system sounds

key.name: show-virtual-streams
key.description: Whether to show virtual streams in the applications menu

key.name: always-show-input-streams
key.description: Show input streams even if no application is recording

key.name: use-symbolic-icons
key.description: Whether to use the default symbolic icons or those provided by PulseAudio

key.name: profile-switcher-hotkey
key.description: Global hotkey to switch / circle pinned profiles

key.name: pinned-profiles
key.description: Profiles to always show in the list of devices, even if they're not retrieved through Gvc.MixerControl
